archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: RelativityOne
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Post Office Corporate IT has engaged KPMG to host and develop an instance of Relativity One to use as a document management system and 'golden source' data repository for all materials searches, submitted to and requested from the POHIT Inquiry. Over the past 2 years POL has been working jointly with KPMG to migrate all relevant databases previously stored by third party service providers (including law firms such as HSF, WBD and P&P) onto this centralised data repository.
Please see the attached spreadsheet for a full list of contents, which includes the following:
1. GLO workspace (WBD)
2. Starling workspace (WBD)
3. CCRC workspace (P&P)
4. POHIT Inquiry (POL)
5. Brisbane Review workspace (HSF)
6. Brisbane Processing workspace (HSF)
7. CCRC-CCRC (TBC)
8. Everlaw databases (WBD)
